thread.title: Howard returns to US, but Costa Rica wins 1-0
thread.title_full: Howard returns to US, but Costa Rica wins 1-0

title: Howard returns to US, but Costa Rica wins 1-0
text:
> Sports Howard returns to US, but Costa Rica wins 1-0 Costa Rica's Kendall Waston, right, defends against United States' Jozy Altidore during the first half of a international soccer friendly match, Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Harrison, N.J. (AP Photo/Julio Cortez)
